text: Rosario Mar√≠a Murillo Zambrana (; born 22 June 1951) is a Nicaraguan politician. She is the co-president and first lady of Nicaragua. She is married to the current president Daniel Ortega. She became vice president of Nicaragua on 10 January 2017. In November 2024, Murillo was declared copresident alongside her husband after a constitutional change. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Nicaragua Category:Current national leaders Category:Vice presidents of Nicaragua Category:First Ladies
title: Rosario Murillo
